CIPHER.80.cipherString: The moment you need to get started is called "now".
CIPHER.80.question: A quote by Shihab Kazi has been encoded with the Pig Pen cipher.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.81.cipherString: Invest your energy in the things you can control.
CIPHER.81.question: The following quote by Steve Backley has been encoded as a Caesar Cipher.  What did they say?

CIPHER.82.cipherString: Make plans for your new goals. And press towards achieving the goals with all your strength.
CIPHER.82.question: The following quote by Lailah Gifty Akita has been encoded as an Aristocrat.  You are told that the word YOUR appears in it twice.

CIPHER.83.cipherString: A library is thought in cold storage.
CIPHER.83.question: The following quote by Herbert Samuel has been encoded using the Tap Code Cipher.  What did they say?

CIPHER.84.cipherString: A diamond is merely a lump of coal that did well under pressure.
CIPHER.84.question: A quote attributed to Henry Kissinger has been encoded as Vigenère cipher using e keyword of WORK.  What did they say?

CIPHER.85.cipherString: Life is a journey worth making.
CIPHER.85.question: The following Dancing Men symbols encode a quote by Diva Jefferson.  What did they say?

CIPHER.86.cipherString: Calamities reveal your capabilities. Take note of this and when times get odd, prepare and shine.
CIPHER.86.question: A quote by Israelmore Ayivor has been encoded as an Aristocrat.  It has the word TIMES in it once.  What did they say?

CIPHER.87.cipherString: Don't spell part backwards. It is a trap.
CIPHER.87.question: What does the following Tap Code cipher decode to?

CIPHER.88.question: A quote by Tennessee Williams has been encoded using the Dancing Men Cipher.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.89.cipherString: Don't put a limit on anything. The more you dream the farther you get.
CIPHER.89.question: The following quote by Michael Phelps needs to be decoded as a Vigenère Cipher using a keyword of BEST

CIPHER.90.cipherString: A friend of mine tried to annoy me with bird puns, but I soon realized that toucan play at that game.
CIPHER.90.question: A friend passed you a joke encoded as an Aristocrat.  The last word is GAME.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.91.cipherString: Those who don't jump will never fly.
CIPHER.91.question: A quote by Leena Ahmad Almashat has been encoded as a Caesar cipher.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.92.cipherString: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
CIPHER.92.question: The following quote by Ronald Reagan has been encoded as a Pig Pen cipher for you to decode.  What did he say?

CIPHER.93.cipherString: The secret of all greatness is knowing what to do with time.
CIPHER.93.question: A quote by Sunday Adelaja has been encoded using the Atbash cipher.  What did they say?

CIPHER.94.cipherString: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work and learning from failure.
CIPHER.94.question: Colin L. Powell offers some advice that has been encoded as an Aristocrat for you to decode.  It has the word WORK in it somewhere.
